name: Spaceship Traveler
description:
A game where you travel and earn each new spaceships and maps by collecting scraps. You can upgrade your ship, each ship has its own abilities. Each map has a harder difficulty than the last and with that comes better rewards. I made this for fun, sorry it doesn't have any sound. I may or may not continue working on it. But give it a try!

CONTROLS:

MOVE LEFT: W or Left Arrow

MOVE RIGHT: D or Right Arrow

USE SPECIAL: Space or click button on screen
